headline: A new technological perspective for your ideas.
minimalDescription: We design and build digital solutions to generate value in our clients and community.

sections.title: Who we are?
description: We are an organization that seeks to offer high-quality technology to society. We design and implement technological solutions to Academy and Companies, supported by Open Source and Cloud technologies.
We are a team of people who are passionate about software development in particular, and technology in general.

sections.title: What do we do?
description: We are working with partners and the academy to develop and launch software products, taking into consideration a holistic path and a comprehensive vision. Further, we have job opportunities for local developers (Peru), improving their experience and pleasure of crafting software.
We love to create pieces of software that are useful for all of us. All our exploration and proposals are open to the public in our repositories.

services.title: Design and branding
services.description: We create a functional design of fast prototyping, but suitable for your idea.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: We use modern software development paradigms.
items: E-commerce with payment platforms (Mercado Pago, Paypal)

services.title: Consultancies and/or Advising
services.description: We help you develop your product from scratch.
items: Research and analysis applied to the case
Workshops, Courses on technologies, their applications and research

services.title: DevOps, Infrastructure and Cloud
services.description: We are specialized in end-to-end services.
items: Deployment of services/microservices in AWS, Digital Ocean

services.title: Data Science and AI
services.description: We extract, clean, process, structure data and give value to its use through AI.
items: Web scraping, web harvesting, or web data extraction
Implementation of Business Intelligent platforms (Metabase, etc)

services.title: Other Services
services.description: We are in constant technological change, we know about tools and technologies in general that can help you grow your business or research.

getInTouchNotification.title: Subscription successful
getInTouchNotification.message: We will contact you as soon as possible.
